Package de.chojo.sadu.updater

Class BaseSqlUpdaterBuilder<T extends JdbcConfig<?>,S extends BaseSqlUpdaterBuilder<T,?>>

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.sadu.updater.BaseSqlUpdaterBuilder<T,S>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the jdbc link defined by the Database
All Implemented Interfaces:
UpdaterBuilder<T,S>
Direct Known Subclasses:
PostgreSqlUpdaterBuilder
public class BaseSqlUpdaterBuilder<T extends JdbcConfig<?>,S extends BaseSqlUpdaterBuilder<T,?>> extends Object implements UpdaterBuilder<T,S>
Class to build a SqlUpdater with a builder pattern

      @CheckReturnValue public S setVersionTable(String versionTable)
